Pricing

No Packages, Only Transparency

Trial

Duration: First 3 Months

No. of Requests: Unlimited

Cost Per Request: ₹0

Integration Costs: ₹0

Plugin Costs: ₹0

Standard

Duration: After the First 3 Months

No. of Requests: Unlimited

Cost Per Request: ₹0.02 (2 paise)

First 1000 requests are free every month

Integration Costs: ₹0

Plugin Costs: Individual Pricing / Plugin
